lines.text: If you are a boob, you will be trapped!
I wish to hell you'd shut up! I ain't no boob and I won't be trapped!
Hey! I wonder, could this be one of them there booby traps?
Ehh... could be.
[Snafu slaps a girl's behind, finding it to be made of metal]
Ah, something new has been added!

[after the mannequin's bra falls off, revealing a pair of bombs]
Bo - bo - booby traps!
[last lines]
Well, at least up here, ha ha, I don't have to worry about no booby traps.
[first lines]
The enemy has fled, abandoning the area. As our forces move up, they must exercise great care. Every object is a possible booby trap.
As our forces move up they must exercise great care every object is a possible booby trap!, some booby traps are more alluring and ingenious than others
[Snafu spots a showerhead wired up to a cannon]
if you are a boob you will be trapped!

[Interrupting him]
Eh I wish to hell you'd shut up!, I ain't no boob and I won't get trapped!
[sticking his tongue out at the narrator]
nyaah!

[Entering a room full of scantily clad female mannequins]
Oooooh boy!
[rushing towards them while panting heavily]
A pienana!
[He attempts to play "Those Endearing Young Charms on the piano]

[gives up]
Eh to hell with it!, I never could get that last note anyhoo!

[Spotting a female mannequin wearing a bra and panties]
Ooooooh boy!
[runs towards it but notices a tobacco waterpipe]
Tobacco!, Ya know I haven't had a good smoke in years.
